entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is mentioned as someone who gave a long talk.

entities.name: quidditch pitch
entities.description: The Quidditch pitch is where the narrator and others are playing Quidditch.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the players in the game of Quidditch.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is another player in the game of Quidditch.

relationships.description: Wood spoke at the Quidditch pitch, but this relationship is not explicitly mentioned. However, it can be inferred that Wood gave a talk on the Quidditch pitch.
The narrator played Quidditch on the Quidditch pitch. This is mentioned in the first sentence of the text: 'It felt wonderful to be back on the Quidditch pitch.'
The narrator and Fred were racing each other around the stadium. This is mentioned in the sentence: 'He soared right around the stadium at full speed, racing Fred and George.'
The narrator was also racing with George. This is mentioned in the same sentence as above.
Fred played Quidditch on the Quidditch pitch, which can be inferred from the context of the text.
George also played Quidditch on the Quidditch pitch. This relationship is similar to the one mentioned above for Fred.
